title: Watch: Why is Donald Trump asking Coca-Cola to change its recipe?
description: The US president says it's better to make the fizzy drink with cane sugar, but why might that be?
content:
US president Donald Trump has said Coca-Cola has agreed to change its recipe. 
Corn syrup is out and cane sugar is in, but what does that mean for the popular fizzy drink?

author: Joe Maring
title: Hate Google TV home screen ads? There’s a new one for you to ignore
description: Not a fan of advertisements on your Google TV? Great news! There's a new Star Wars/Coca-Cola one that you're going to hate.
content:
• Google has started displaying a new Star Wars/Coca-Cola ad on Google TV home screens.
  • The new ad is displayed at the top of the For You page and takes over the majority of the UI.
